DataSource.query:
select
distinct *
from
(
select
case
  when instr(zielkostenstelle,'_CMD_UMLAGE') <> 0
  then 'P_'||nvl(replace(substr(zielkostenstelle,1,length(zielkostenstelle)-11),'P_'),'REST')
  else 'P_REST'
end as PARENT,
CASE
 WHEN substr(zielkostenstelle,1,2)='P_'
 THEN nvl(zielkostenstelle,'NA')
 ELSE 'P_'||nvl(zielkostenstelle,'NA')
end as child,
'N' as N
from
dtl_pv_kosten_rest
where
pv_kez='PVS' 
and monatsscheibe=(select monatsscheibe from pv_parameter)

union all
select distinct 'P_REST',
'P_'||PVS16,
'N'
from dtl_br_vertrag
where  monatsscheibe=(select monatsscheibe from pv_parameter)

union all
select distinct 'P_REST',
'P_'||kostenstelle,
'N'
from dtl_br_provisionen_rest
where  pv_kez='PVS'
and monatsscheibe=(select monatsscheibe from pv_parameter)

union all
select distinct
CASE 
  WHEN substr(produkt_zk,1,2)='P_'
  THEN substr(produkt_zk,1,length(produkt_zk)-11)
  ELSE 'P_'||substr(produkt_zk,1,length(produkt_zk)-11)
end,
CASE 
  WHEN substr(produkt_zk,1,2)='P_'
  THEN produkt_zk
  ELSE 'P_'||produkt_zk
end,
'N'
from dtl_pv_kosten_cmd_umlage
where monatsscheibe=(select monatsscheibe from pv_parameter)

union all

select 
'P_REST',
'P_'||PVS,
'N'
from dtl_br_kunden_man_rest
where monatsscheibe=(select monatsscheibe from pv_parameter)

order by 2,1 ASC  
)
order by 2,1
